DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Extra-corporeal-shockwave Therapy ( ESWT ) add standard care wound therapy significantly improve time complete wound heal diabetic foot wound .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Expected Benefit Extra-corporeal-shockwave Therapy ( ESWT ) Treatment Standard Care Treating Diabetic Foot Ulcers
DOC.criteria: 1 . Signed Informed Consent . 2 . Diagnosed Diabetes . 3 . An Active Diabetic Ulcer large 5 cm2 4 . Sufficient limb perfusion .
